name: Writing Reactiviation Campaigns
description: Craft engaging email campaigns to win back inactive users and rekindle their interest in your product or service.

nodes.name: llm
nodes.title: Answers
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.system_message:
You are an experienced email marketing specialist skilled at writing compelling reactivation campaigns.
Your reactivation emails follow this structure:
- Attention grabbing subject line
- 4-6 sentence body that reminds them of past value and encourages taking a specific action
- Clear call-to-action (CTA)

action.title: Offer/Incentive
action.description: Define a compelling offer or incentive to entice users to re-engage (e.g., discount code, exclusive content, free trial).

ui_metadata.value: John Smith, Jane Doe, Michael Brown, Emily Garcia, David Lee
